Package com.xd.cps2002

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xd.cps2002.Map
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicMap
    public abstract class Map
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int size
      The size member stores the dimension of the square map (size x size tiles).
      private TileType[][] tiles
      The tiles member stores the actual types for each tile on the map that the player can walk on.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map​(int n)
      Constructor used to initialize an empty Map object.
      Map​(TileType[][] tiles)
      Constructor used to initialize a Map object with a pre-generated set of tiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) abstract void generate()
      Method used to randomly generate the map.
      int getSize()
      Getter method used to get the size attribute of the Map object.
      (package private) TileType getTileType​(int x, int y)
      Function used to check the type of the tile at the given coordinate in the map.
      (package private) boolean isValidPosition​(int x, int y)
      Function used to check if the given coordinate is a valid position which exists in the map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • size

        private int size
        The size member stores the dimension of the square map (size x size tiles).

      • tiles

        private TileType[][] tiles
        The tiles member stores the actual types for each tile on the map that the player can walk on.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map​(int n)
        Constructor used to initialize an empty Map object.
        Parameters:
        n - size of the n x n square map
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the method is given an invalid size parameter (outside of the range 5-50)

      • Map

        public Map​(TileType[][] tiles)
        Constructor used to initialize a Map object with a pre-generated set of tiles.
        Parameters:
        tiles - a 2D array of TileType elements which represents the placement of the tiles in the map
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if tiles is null, empty or if the lists in the 2D array do not have the same lengths.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Getter method used to get the size attribute of the Map object.
        Returns:
        the size of the map

      • generate

        abstract void generate()
        Method used to randomly generate the map. This method should be implemented by each subclass of the Map class to allow different methods of map generation.

      • isValidPosition

        boolean isValidPosition​(int x,
                        int y)
        Function used to check if the given coordinate is a valid position which exists in the map.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate in the map
        y - y-coordinate in the map
        Returns:
        true if the given (x,y) coordinate is a valid tile position in the map and false otherwise.

      • getTileType

        TileType getTileType​(int x,
                     int y)
        Function used to check the type of the tile at the given coordinate in the map.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate in the map
        y - y-coordinate in the map
        Returns:
        the type of the tile at position (x,y)
